thread.section_title: Fairfield Inn & Suites New York Midtown Manhattan/Penn Station - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: 6 nights in the city
thread.title_full: 6 nights in the city - Review of Fairfield Inn & Suites New York Midtown Manhattan/Penn Station, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Kerrie M
title: 6 nights in the city
text:
We stayed Sunday through Saturday we had a suite on the 22nd floor . The view was beautiful . The staff was very accommodating and always going out of their way to help. The rooms were cleaned daily with fresh linens . The beds were comfortable and we were very comfortable with 3 teenagers 14 -17. We look forward to staying here again.
Room Tip: The higher the floor the better the view See more room tips
